Address.label: Address
Address.value: 111 NORTH CANAL STREET,SUITE 325, CHICAGO, Illinois, 60606, United States

CompanyDescription.label: Company Description
CompanyDescription.value: Potbelly Corp owns and franchises hundreds of limited-service restaurants specializing in sandwiches and salads, shakes. The menu includes toasty sandwiches, signature salads, soups, chili, sides, desserts, and, in breakfast locations it serves breakfast sandwiches and steel-cut oatmeal. Most of its locations are company-owned and located in the United States, with Illinois and Texas housing far more locations than any other state. The company has franchise partners in a number of countries. Excluding the United States, most of Potbelly's franchises are in the Middle East.

value.name: Adam P. Noyes
value.title: Chief Operations Officer & Senior Vice President
